review: An amazing purchase. Definitely worth every penny. You can watch Netflix or Amazon prime or other streaming like HBOgo or Hulu! It's as easy as plugging it in.

review: We have not had much luck with this so far. We have been pretty disappointed. It isn't picking up our WiFi signal. I guess we should have read the reviews before purchasing because it seems like this is a common problem.

review: The fire stick is easy to use and hasn't had any problems in the first week.
